sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import Jobs from './pages/Jobs'; import Candidates from './pages/Candidates'; import Assessments from './pages/Assessments'; import Header from './components/common/Header'; import ErrorBoundary from './components/common/ErrorBoundary'; import LoginPage from './pages/LoginPage'; import JobsBoardForCandidates from './pages/JobsBoardForCandidates'; import MyApplications from './pages/MyApplications'; import './styles/main.css'; const App: React.FC = () => { const [role, setRole] = useState(localStorage.getItem('role')); if (!role) { return { localStorage.setItem('role', role); setRole(role); }} />; } return (
{role === 'HR' ? ( <>

Welcome HR!

Manage jobs, candidates, and assessments from your dashboard.

💼

Manage Jobs

Create, edit, and organize job postings with drag-and-drop reordering.

View Jobs
👥

Track Candidates

Manage candidate pipeline with kanban boards and detailed profiles.

View Candidates
📝

Create Assessments

Build custom assessments with live preview and conditional questions.

View Assessments
) : ( <>

Welcome Candidate!

Browse jobs, apply, and track your applications and assessments.

💼

Browse Jobs

View available jobs and submit your application.

View Jobs
📄

My Applications

Track your application status and complete assessments.

My Applications
)}
); }; export default App;
